message.body: I haven't talked to you forever, crazy. How's your heart?
The last time I talked to you was the day before Christmas and I was a dick. My heart is frustretated today. In the studio with the Protowhores. How is your hat?
Huh, I didn't realize you were being a dick but tell me more... I'm doing. Money issues, but what's new or special about that.
I quoted Dylan and you said not a word so I figured a played a dick card. Guess not. Im rich want some money?
Song lyrics from you wasn't novel... Let me know if I upset you though. And Yes, I'll take all of it.
Ok I'll let you know it. I think you're wonderful.
When do you leave for tour again?

I realized this morning while I searched for the guitar I had in mind to give you that lo and behold, I had already given it away. I am however now able to send you beard and moustache trimmings which is fab.
I want my guitar to sound like a black gospel singer. How do I do that?

Uhhhhh take away it's rights and means to make independently produced music and tell it it can do anything that it wants, then make a mash of pages from the bible and collard greens and pour it into its orifices
No really Marf, how does one invent a style? You're a creative genius, how would you do it

I'll think about it. But really, anything is possible. I turned into a gorilla today. Use all the tools you have and really really try to do it exactly and see what you find. But yea, I'll think about it
Wanna hear the closest I've ever heard to it?
Yes, but I'm going to sleep now so I'll listen to it later. But find your own way! No mirrors in the studio
